ISic002925. Epitaph of Martinus, a coachman

Facsimile Images

((cross_uninterpreted)) Mem[o]ria
Martini car-
pentarị pa-
triciorom

Apparatus criticus

Text of Korhonen 2010 ; Manganaro: carpentari q(uondam) or carpentariq(ue)

English translation

In memory of Martinus, coachman to the patricians

commentary

Korhonen 2010: n.23 justifies reading carpentario in line 3 on the grounds that such a mixture of cases is attested in other examples.
